alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dixie County through 545 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Cross City, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Tennille, Shamrock, Clara, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Guaranto Springs, Jena, Hines, Jonesboro, Eugene, Fletcher, Yellow Jacket and Fanning Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
